website_summaries.verdict: This is a compact plug adapter that fits easily into your suitcase and will be useful almost everywhere you go.
pros: Charge up to 3 devices at once
Safety shutters prevent you from coming into direct contact with the live parts of the socket
cons: If you're charging more than one item at once, it takes longer to charge each of them

customer_reviews.title: MUST-HAVE Product for International Travelers
customer_reviews.text: This All-in-one World Wide International Travel Charger Adapter is easy to pack, solidly manufactured and easy to use. It plugs dual-voltage appliances into more than 150 foreign country wall outlets. Most importantly it also includes 2 USB charge ports for your cell. Great for iPhone/Smartphones and tablets, and computers. This world travel adapter features Surge protection fuse, power indicator light, plug lock and built-in safety shutters. This is a MUST-HAVE product for international travelers
customer_reviews.author: Freeport

customer_reviews.title: A+++ all the way (updated)
customer_reviews.text: I recently supported something similar to this on Kickstarter at three times the price, and it didn't arrive in time for my trip. I bought this and I could not be happier. I am in the middle of my UK trip and it has performed perfectly with everything I have asked, plugging in my laptop and charging phones at the same time without any issue. I canceled my kickstarter and ordered another of these for my fiancé to have. UPDATE: Two years in, has been to 5 different countries and has worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: LBLI

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Product!
customer_reviews.text: I must admit at first I was a little skeptical that this product would work. Let me tell you it is everything plus more for the traveler who is going overseas. We landed in Germany where I used the EU plug and let others plug their phones into the USBs and the plug in the front side that act as as an adapter. The duty free shop that was there was asking 42 Euro for a similar adapter that didn’t have all the plugs this one does. In short, great purchase for this trip and more to come.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: An awesome and safe adapter
customer_reviews.text: This is really awesome. It's very convenient and safe. There is a button to push to change to different plug. And I like the material of this adapter, the quality is obvious very good. I used to buy one in a store, the price is more expensive but the quality is much lower than this. If you travel a lot, this adapter must be your best choice. Which make me happier is that there are two USB portal. It's not only an adapter but also an charger for your mobile devices, you don't even need to bring your charger with you. All-in-one is the best description of this product. You will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine L

customer_reviews.title: If you travel to Europe, you need this...
customer_reviews.text: This summer (2018), I took my first true international trip from the US to England and Ireland. I picked this thing up so that I could use and charge my electronics across the pond. The design is simply brilliant! It accepts multiple different inputs and allows you to select the appropriate output for the wall socket of the country you are in. Best of all, it's compact, maybe 1.5-2" on a side. Pro tip: bring a power strip from home when you travel. Plug this thing into the wall, and your power strip into this. Then, plug your electronics into the power strip from, which it should already match anyway.
customer_reviews.author: VH Pascale

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't blow up my devices! I used the USB ports to charge phones, usb battery packs and a mifi without issues on a trip to Europe. Packs small and the color is bright so you wont forget it. I like this adapter because you don't have a box of small parts to lose or pack whenever you move around. What else do you need? Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gideon

customer_reviews.title: A Great Travel Adapter
customer_reviews.text: This looks like just what the doctor ordered for my European vacation. I can leave behind the chargers for my cell phone, tablet and medical items. I will be taking the charger for the laptop, but it is rated for 100 - 240 Volts and this Universal Travel Adaptor will adapt the U.S. power plug to the European outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He said the Amazon adapter was perfect while the other one was too bulky and annoying ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and another "higher end" aka more expensive adapter for my parents. They traveled to Australia, New Zealand, and Fiji. This simple version was intended to be for my mom and the higher end version was supposed to be for my tech savvy dad. My dad strongly preferred this simplistic design over the more expensive adapter. He said the Amazon adapter was perfect while the other one was too bulky and annoying to use.
customer_reviews.author: callmeashley

customer_reviews.title: I like it’s compact and pawn-size
customer_reviews.text: I like it’s compact and pawn-size, that is easy to snug into any place in the luggage or suitcase. With EU, UK, AUS, and US 4 different power standards, any global travelers, or business professionals would feel safe to travel with it on hand. 2 USB outlets would help charge one cell phone and one battery simonteniously on the night before, in the hotel,so working professionals or travelers will have power loaded fully the next day to get on their journey. Nice and thoughtful design!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: USB confusion
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty solid, and I'll be putting it to the real test soon. One thing I found strange though... The USB ports aren't exactly as expected. This is described as a 2.4A charger (aka 'quick charger'), however, this only supplies 2.4A if you use ONE port. If you decide to use BOTH USB ports, they will only supply 1.2A each. Significantly slower if you're in a hurry and need to charge two phones. I'm not unhappy with the product, but I wish I knew this limitation before I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great value and works well in Asia
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and fit in every outlet I ran in to while in China, Taiwan and Vietnam. Hopefully works as well in Europe.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Good travel adapter.
customer_reviews.text: This travel adapter seems to work really well, although I haven't traveled anywhere I have used the US plug and the USB plugs and it seems to work very well. I like that is a button to lock everything in place when you're all set up. Without traveling the world to use all the different adapters I'd say I recommend this travel adapter. I also like how it's just about got the instructions on it of how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I did some traveling to the UK and Europe and this adapter worked great! Every country that we needed an adaptor for, this worked. I was able to have items plugged in the USB ports and the actual plugs at the same time. Note:this is NOT a converter so be sure whatever you are plugging in can handle the voltage. I will definitely use this adaptor in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stepanovs

customer_reviews.title: Good for Travel & use it at home ,too
customer_reviews.text: I like that this travel adapter can be used in many different countries. It is very useful because the USB cables can be used to many products (like new fan ,they use it . Phone , iPad....),so I like it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Zhenmei z.

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work First Attempt
customer_reviews.text: I tried to plug my mobile phone into this unit and nothing. No charge at all. I attempted to use the USB port that was lit up, but it did not work either. This was a total bust and was the only device I brought with me to Germany. I cannot get it returned soon enough to receive a refund because I am in Germany for a month. Glad I didn't spend more on it.
customer_reviews.author: RLCBNHH

customer_reviews.title: International Traveller?  You need this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on the eve of a family trip to Spain and France. Best pre-trip purchase I made - with the outlets and the USB ports, this made charging everyone's devices very easy, and was just what I needed to use my CPAP machine.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Worked well during my trip to australia. I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well during my trip to australia. I was able to charge my phone, tablet and laptop off of this device at the same time. used it exclusively for 3 weeks and still working to this day, over 3 months later!
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: MISLEADING
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed as this description and the pictures are completely wrong. I received a light blue cylinder that only has one area to plug in your device and only one possible option that would plug into the wall of the country you are visiting. It says it works in China but is not the correct kind of adapter to fit there! Although the description says it works in 150+ countries, mine only says it works in UK, Hong Kong (which it does not), Malaysia, and Qatar!! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Worked great after travelling to Milan/Copenhagen.
customer_reviews.text: This adapter worked great for when I traveled to Milan and Copenhagen. I did not have issues with the USB port as some were experiencing. It is also super portable. Remember this is an adapter and not a converter. I did not purchase a converter to plug in my Iphone/apple watch to this adapter as most small gadgets do not require a converter.
customer_reviews.author: dp2000

customer_reviews.title: Like a Swiss Army Knife
customer_reviews.text: This universal travel adapter is compact and well built. It features electrical outlet plugs for Europe, United Kingdom/Hong Kong, Australia, and United States. Easy to use, just select the correct plug for the country your in and slide open to the lock position. To retract the plug you need to press the release button on the opposite side of the adapter housing then slide the plug back to the retracted position. It includes 2 USB power ports each rated at 1.2A to charge many types of electronic devices. You can also connect a laptop and other small electrical devices to this adapter. This is a must have adapter for world travels.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Chen

customer_reviews.title: USB Convience Internationally
customer_reviews.text: Saved my butt. Easy to pack for a trip and can be used almost anywhere. Has the ability to accept a 110 plug and two USB Ports. Worked in Israel, Greece and England (Heathrow Airport). Could not ask much more from a product. The almost anywhere is because of the location of the USB Ports.On the small ship we were on I had trouble fitting in the USB wires from the bottom. Still would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bob in the Valley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that there are also 2 USB plugs i don’t need to bring 2-3 adaptators with me. Green color is very nice and the material is very cool
customer_reviews.author: julien Reynaud

customer_reviews.title: It worked great. Small single adapter takes up little space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to England. It worked great. Small single adapter takes up little space, and fits several world outlets. However once in England I realized my daughter had one that was more like a power strip. Charged 2 phones, and her daughter's Kindle fire. I had to alternate my charging. Phone, and oxygen concentrator. I'm just glad I didn't bring my Kindle or Fitbit. If you only have one thing or don't mind alternating charging, this is a great travel adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia O.

customer_reviews.title: confidence it would work
customer_reviews.text: Took it to Portugal and Spain for a couple of weeks. Worked the first half then it "supposedly" caused our whole room to lose pwr. Smelled smoke where our phone usb hooked in (it was very hot!) and we had to change rooms in the middle of the night. I'm not totally convinced it caused the entire pwr outrage however; it was definitely way too hot and smelled of smoke. Didn't use it the rest of the trip. Price was decent, didn't seem to fit in the Euro sockets very well, not sure if thats the case with all or not.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F. Sebald

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY....Destroyed my computer and other devices
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk. While traveling, it destroyed my computer power supply as well as a couple of phone power supplies. I would give it zero stars if I could. It has already cost me more than $500 to replace my destroyed devices.. DO NOT BUY UPDATE: --------DO SOMETHING AMAZON!!!!!!!----------- The seller will spam you if you do not remove the bad review. They basically demanded that I remove the bad review to issue a refund. AMAZON should ban this supplier since they went through the trouble of finding my private email (how did they do it AMAZON?!!!!!) to spam me.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Buy it! Better... Buy TWO!
customer_reviews.text: I wish we had bought 2 or 3 for our trip - worked like a charm. Two of us went to Ireland, Germany, Austria and France. Charging phones, tablets, cameras AND for hair things like flat irons - it worked like a charm. Just wished we had bought more than one.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kimsey

customer_reviews.title: Convenient design
customer_reviews.text: I love this little adapter. It's awesome to have one adapter for anywhere you want to go and any starting country plug. This is so convenient!! It's also great at home because it has 2 USB ports so it's great for charging devices even when I'm not traveling
customer_reviews.author: Meghana Raja

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!
customer_reviews.text: This adapter fried my blow dryer, so I had no dryer from the second day of my two week trip onward. Not only was the dryer ruined, but the adapter itself stopped working, meaning my mom couldn’t use her CPAP machine - she was jet lagged and then had to deal with her apnea full on. It was awful. All in all, I lost more than a hundred dollars and my poor mom suffered a lot on our trip. Wish I had spent more to get a better, more reliable adapter. Lesson learned
customer_reviews.author: aruizOT

customer_reviews.title: Happy trails Hans.....
customer_reviews.text: This is a NICE international charger! I am going to all sorts of European countries soon and I hope it works well! It'll be UK, France, and a couple of others where tall tall men reside. You can charge 3 devices at once! You get 2 USB's and a regular one where you can plug stuff in. It's a nice color and the US part works well when I tested the continuity of the product for the others. If it blows up or fails, I'll let ya guys know! That's it happy trails Hans!
customer_reviews.author: Pankil

customer_reviews.title: This is such a useful gadget! My sister is a flight attendant and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a useful gadget! My sister is a flight attendant and I've had to steal it back from her on several occasions. I like that I can charge my phone with the usb ports and charge my laptop with the outlets at the same time, and the blue light makes it easy to plug things in the dark. My room mate hates the light though, as it keeps her up. The only modification I would make is an on/off switch for that.
customer_reviews.author: Katina

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I used this while living in Italy and it is great. Lightweight and easy to travel with
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant little box!
customer_reviews.text: This adapter is fantastic! The perfect solution for multiple country power conversion in a lightweight, palm-sized cube. We bought 3 for our trip to the UK. We even left one with the family we visited. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cins11

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a month long backpacking trip! It allowed me to charge three devices at once which was handy at hostels. The different configurations lock into place and you just press a button when you need to retract it. Only reason I docked a star was that the light below the USB ports is very very bright, which made it inconvenient when sharing a room with others. I would often have to hide the outlet under a jacket at night.
customer_reviews.author: C.J.

customer_reviews.title: SLOW CHARGING!
customer_reviews.text: This device was useless for charging my S8+. It charge sooooo SLOW! Hours to charge just 10%! The plug converter worked just fine but the most important part for me was to be able to charge my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mike PhD PE

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this would be a little difficult to use, but ended up being so easy for travel! I got one for me and my dad so we each carried our own. I loved that it also has two usb hubs so I can charge more than one device at a time. Will be bringing this every time I head out of the country.
customer_reviews.author: velvetdreams

customer_reviews.title: A travel must-have
customer_reviews.text: I was sent to Ireland (originally from the US) on a 6 month work assignment, and used that as an opportunity to explore Ireland and Europe as much as possible. With this around, I never had to worry about if where I was staying had UK or EU outlets. The USB slots were great, hubby and I could both charge our phones without any worry. We used this for several trips across many weeks, with no issue. It can feel a little cheap when you move the sliders to get the different plugs to come out, but just be gentle with it and you shouldn’t have an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Renee

customer_reviews.title: solid connections, secure prongs, very happy
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the best built adapters I've used. I like that the AUS and US prongs are separate - no more dealing with annoying twisting prongs, and each prong has a pretty solid lock -- countless others have popped back in when trying to insert them. My girlfriend is using this on her trip right now and its her favorite of the 3 she went with.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a trip to Sweden and London. It worked great. Charged 3 things at a time with no problems. I love the compact design and not having to keep track of all the adapters. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tiffanyann7

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. Definitely worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Very easy switch between different plugs and the two usb sockets both worked well. The blue LED light in the USB plug is a nice addition as many of the European plugs are switched. So it is easy to tell that electricity is flowing. Having thought I was charging my phone and wasn’t in the past, this feature was much appreciated. It is also very light and completely devoid of all those different plug adapter parts on other products.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Prefer another model to this
customer_reviews.text: WE purchased prior to our trip to Italy. The adapter worked OK. The slide out option for European plug has a tendency to slide back into the central housing yet when fully extended caused a weight imbalance for attaching plugs to the main unit. Also, the round plugs for the European adapter are a bit small and I found outlets that the plugs would not fit snug enough into for charging (like in CDG airport in Paris). All in all, I prefer the PORS-ELA 2.4A Dual USB International Travel Power Adapter (Blue) I had purchased a prior year.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from France and Germany and this alloeed us to charge our cellphones, digital camera, and power brick. Only user error that occurred that could have potentially been a problem was the first day we didn't push the Europe adapter out far enough. Didn't got into their outlet hole. The second day we tried again and figured out we didn't have the connection out far enough ^•^ Problem solved and great photos were taken!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great for international travel
customer_reviews.text: This is great PLUG adapter. I recently used during a long trip across Southeast Asia. I used it in Australia, Indonesia and Singapore without any problems. But be aware this is not a power converter. Most of Southeast Asia uses 220 volts. Plug a straight US device that does not clearly state it has an internal converter that allows it to handle 220 volts and you are looking for a disaster. You will normally find notice of this type of converter on the bottom of your power device.
customer_reviews.author: renoman

customer_reviews.title: The one, and the only (Okay I take two)...
customer_reviews.text: The two of us have been traveling several times a year for 5 years through Asia and the EU and these hold up just fine and really like them. Be careful with things like electric razors and such - things you plug in must be 110/220 adjustable. Most things are - but things with motors tend to not be (I've blown several shaving razors e.g.). We spend weeks at a time overseas and for the two of us two of these are all we need (2x two USB = 4 plus 2x US-style plugs = plenty). These are good, road-tested, and I would have zero reservations about recommending them. Get two.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brunetti

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but no earth / ground connection
customer_reviews.text: This adapter does the job of allowing me to plug electronics into overseas outlets, as long as they are only two-prong plugs. The only drawback is that there is no connection to ground for the three-prong electronics that I have. But for running a hairdryer or razor, charging a phone, tablet, or camera, this does the job very well in a reasonably compact space.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J

customer_reviews.title: Lie
customer_reviews.text: This product does NOT work for Mexico and I sent it back. They mislead you on the advertisement and say over 100+ countries. This is not true. I would suggest looking up the specifications you need and then buying an adapter that meets that specifications. This was a rip off and I returned it before I even left for my trip.
customer_reviews.author: chattycat

customer_reviews.title: Works great, doesn’t fall out of wall
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that makes this less than perfect is that it has a light when it’s plugged in that you can’t turn off. It’s easy to use and works well and it doesn’t fall out of the wall - even when I plugged my heavy power pack in! This is an adapter not a voltage converter but as an adapter for the EU and UK it is perfect and I’ll be buying one for my mom.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadget for overseas travel
customer_reviews.text: Great little gadget for overseas travel! If you travel you definitely need one of these! The night light is a great little bonus actually and came in handy on more than one occasion while we stayed at various AirBnB's during this trip!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed as otherwise it did the job
customer_reviews.text: USB port "ate" my USB cord on first use. Now the cord is permanently stuck and won't come out. Disappointed as otherwise it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Adidashine

customer_reviews.title: Used it all over Europe
customer_reviews.text: Using this is a breeze. We took it to Europe for 2 weeks, went to France, England, Switzerland, Austria, and the Czech republic and it's still looking brand new. It's sturdy and SO MUCH EASIER than taking the ones with little pieces you have to plug into the main part; if people even still have those :) The green color helps you to not forget it if you're leaving a place in a hurry, and we never had any issues with it not sitting in the outlet correctly or charging well. I'd recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Zech Doran

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm, Thailand & Cambodia
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a recent trip to Thailand and Cambodia, and it was easy to use, stayed securely in the set positions. So easy to use! Had no problems using any American plugs or USB devices. Nice to have two USB ports, but more would be better. I'm only giving it a 4 vs a 5 because there are other models out there with 4 USB slots. It's amazing how fast those fill up: phone, phone battery, camera, camera battery...
customer_reviews.author: Nutrition Nut

customer_reviews.title: Worked everywhere we went!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this product! Got it for travel in Europe and it worked for us in France, Spain, Italy and Switzerland. The 2 USB ports were nice to have! The only downside was it had a rather bright blue light shining whenever it was plugged in! We like it dark in the room so we usually just covered it to block the light- seems a bit unnecessary to me though! But functioned very well for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The product works well and is as described. It doesn't stay very securely in an outlet but maybe thats just the was the EU sockets are? Regardless, I used this for 2 weeks in Italy with no issues. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cattrelc

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Adapter
customer_reviews.text: I will be traveling for work (going to India) for a few months so I needed something that I can use to charge both my laptop and phones. This has great reviews so I thought I would try this out. I used a home and it works great so far. Both my laptop and phones charge just fine and have not had any issues yet. Also, I love that it has a lot of options (when I travel to different countries) so I will be use it around the world. I will be sure to update this after I use it abroad to see if it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Patel

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any frequent travellers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and one I'd qualify as a must have for anyone who travels with any regularity. It does exactly what it should, which is allow you to plug into any outlet no matter the location. The extra USB ports are also great so you can multi-charge (though I usually just plug in a power bank to charge all my devices). The only things I'd say could be improved are the size as it is a bit bulky and it would be nice if the selected prongs would stay locked (if you push the UK prongs for example it actually slides back in which pauses the charging) but otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Kim

customer_reviews.title: Worked for most electronics in AU
customer_reviews.text: I used this in several outlets in AU for my US laptop and phone chargers. It worked pretty well except for my electric razor, that didn’t work at any location, made it sound really loud like it was overpowered. This is nice that has options for multiple styles though it makes it bulky. If I were buying over again, I would get one exclusive to AU since it would be smaller. I seem all over in the airport when I got there and some pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Schafty

customer_reviews.title: I am very impressed with this universal adapter. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this universal adapter. I paid over two times the price for another one at an Airport while on business trip. Later while trying to use it, I realized it didn't have a ground port for US plug. So I bought this one for my next trip. This one looks similar and has more versatility. It works well too. I am definitely giving this a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: This is the best universal travel adapter that I have had
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this is a "user friendly" product. It is light and handy, so it won't become a burden when you are traveling, especially if you are a backpacker. And it has LED light, so you know it works or not when you plug it in. It has 2 USB ports so you can charge your cell phone without occupied your outlet. And the body has a special design for your fingers which helps you to plug in or take the adapter out easier. This is the best universal travel adapter that I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and nice to have when traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Took a four week trip through the UK and Europe and loved having this on me! I used it in each of the five countries without a single problem. It’s bulkier in size, but with four options and two USB ports, my boyfriend and I were so thankful! We were able to keep everything charged, fairly quickly. Never tripped an outlet, sturdy, good quality. Would love to order another one!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie C.

customer_reviews.title: It works, but had an issue
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine, until my iPhone cable became stuck in the thing in London the first day I used it. Then, even after a week traveling the darn thing is still impossible to remove (has become permanently attached). It's functional, but I had to buy a new charging cable for my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent affordable travel adaptor
customer_reviews.text: Just used on our European tour. Light enough not to sag in outlet. Small so takes up less space in packing. Handy because you can plug your cell phone or other appliance to charge at same time. No other adapter accessories needed. Bright color meant we always saw it when checking room before we left. The price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: scrappygail

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my business trip to Dubai. It worked great! It was also super helpful for a colleague of mine who was from Poland and didnt have an adaptor for her Europe plugs. I keep it in my work backpack for guests who visit the US or if I need the USB charging ports. Excellent item to keep on hand!
customer_reviews.author: EPZ

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, compact adapter plug. No question it will work in the UK, Australia and Western Europe. Since I'm in the US at the moment, I can't verify it will work in Eastern Europe or Asia. Nevertheless, it's a space saver letting me throw out my rather large bag of assorted adaptors and transformers.
customer_reviews.author: Danelle Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Broke without plugging anything over 240v in
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these prior to my trip to France and the UK. They were working really well and then all of a sudden the AC ports stopped working on both. The usb still works, though. But I had nothing to charge my laptop with anymore, so I had to buy another adapter while in Europe.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Frazier

customer_reviews.title: so glad I got this
customer_reviews.text: its cute and has a light on it so you know that it is charging. love love loved having this on my trip. great quality and very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Great international travel companion!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my recent trip to Europe. Was able to charge our phones and laptops all at once as if we were charging back home. The USB outlets are a great addition and saved a lot of space. Would definitely recommend this anyone who does lots of international traveling. Doesn't convert power but would be nice to have for a newer version.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: A must have for international travel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this specifically for a trip to Europe. It works great and I love that it has usb slots as well. I did research and learned that Switzerland required different ones which I purchased too. However this would have worked in Switzerland as well which I found out when I was there.
customer_reviews.author: Hmbvajgrl21

customer_reviews.title: Versatile product
customer_reviews.text: The adapter arrived exactly as described. I've used this model in Europe, Asia, and USA without any issues. It is not intended to be a power converter. But for charging laptops, tablets, and mobile phones it works quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G

customer_reviews.title: Worked in Italy
customer_reviews.text: Just used this in Italy. Worked perfectly. I liked having 2 usb plug sockets plus a regular socket. Charged 3 devices at the same time with this nifty universal charger. The light emanating from the usb socket didn’t bother me.
customer_reviews.author: R Bearland

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect size for travel. It’s great to use for smaller electrical needs like charging a phone, iPad, etc. limited use for when wanting to use high powered equipment like blow dryer or flat iron. Overall good purchase though and worked very well when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: MathJ.

customer_reviews.title: Easy, versatile, and reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. This worked awesome for a recent trip to Austria and Switzerland- love the versatility and was super easy to travel with! We will be buying a couple more to have on hand for future travels.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This travel adapter gets the job done. It is small and lightweight and conveniently includes the adapters for all major outlet types, along woth direct USB. This is ideal for traveling abroad, especially when going to multiple countries.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Ore

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Travel Adaptor
customer_reviews.text: Small, light, convenient and functional travel adapter. Easily plug in several devices. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: R. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I would like to return the adapter for ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because I was traveling to Paris, France. The US outlet did not work. I plugged my phone into the US outlet to charge and it wouldn't charge. The only ports that worked were the USB ports. Very disappointed. I would like to return the adapter for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Winston M

customer_reviews.title: defective usb port
customer_reviews.text: at first it was te best.bit after 2-3 wks of not even using everyday, the other usb port had annissue
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: It worked just fine in Europe(Barcelona). Not so great on the cruise ship. My beard trimmer seemed to be getting more electricity than needed so it started making noise. May have something to do with the ship, itself. Other than that our electronics were charged properly. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three continents, no problems
customer_reviews.text: This has performed flawlessly across three continents so far. When you're not sure about the "outlet factor" at your lodging, this keeps you working. with 2 USB outlets. The screaming green color makes it easy to locate in your bag, and reminds you to pack it up when you're leaving. I even use it at home for the dual USB outlet charging convenience. I personally like the small light it emits for travel, as some places can be very dark, and it helps keep you oriented if you should wake up. I combine this with some 10' USB cables for maximum versatility in those AirBnB's with oddly placed outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Smee23

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Would work much better if it held my laptop plug in. Kept falling out requiring me to shove a desk against the plug to keep the plug in the charger. Otherwise worked pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Must for international travel
customer_reviews.text: My trip to the EU and Ireland was a success with this little adapter. Love the ability to plug in 2 additional USB cables for charging cellphones etc. Don't know why anyone would travel anymore with the old "kits" with a ton of adapters.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Vasica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Europe
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for our trip to Europe. Worked in Italy, Switzerland, Germany and Austria. Has a blue light on it but it wasn’t too bright.
customer_reviews.author: K Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I found this because I learned the hard way on a trip to South Africa that outlets aren't universal. This would've come in handy then but I'm grateful that I had it with me this time in Martinique. Love that it has the various shapes for both input and output.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these. Right now I am in Paris France and both are in full use. They perform as advertised. Since most new electronics use either 110 or 240 volts no transformer is necessary. Really convenient to carry and use. I just bought another of these for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lennon

customer_reviews.title: Patience is key!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly when I went on my Southeast Asia trip in November. I still use it for an emergency outlet in the US also. The only thing I was a little bummed about was that it wasn't a rapid charger. So charge time was a bit longer than I was used to.
customer_reviews.author: Damon&Laura

customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my needs when traveling in Italy. (If using a blow dryer, use a different one that converts power)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a month in Italy, Montenegro, Croatia, and the UK. Product worked perfectly in every location, and charged two phones via USB ports and a laptop via outlet without issue. Extremely happy with this purchase, and it's a must for any multi-country travel.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Used this in Europe
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a trip to Europe but it would work in so many other countries. There are all kinds of adapters on this and cost the same as some adapters that only convert one kind of power source. This is a must-have for the avid traveler!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this in the U.K. so far and it worked perfectly. I mostly used the USB ports, sometimes both at once, and never had any problems. My boyfriend balked at how bulky it is, but then I showed him how it has several adapters all in one gadget, and he decided he needs one now too. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Haffy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Works throughout Europe.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our trip to Spain, Italy, England, France and Prague. This is a well made sturdy product. Also got an extended charger since iPhones batteries drain fast.
customer_reviews.author: TLove

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend by an international female traveler learning to pack less.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have when traveling internationally. Perfect to keep in a carryon for quick use at the airport and in between locations. I have used with basic products like phones and laptops as well as high voltage products like hair appliances. It’s never had any issues and the usb function is great because you can source for several things at once.
customer_reviews.author: leahbia

customer_reviews.title: ONE STOP ADAPTER
customer_reviews.text: I used this adapter in four different countries in Europe incl. the UK which has a much different power source and style. It worked fantastic. Best bang for your buck especially cos you can also plug in two data points at the same time. Great piece of kit for any traveler.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B Long

customer_reviews.title: The UK adapter works fine, but the US consistently falls out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Two major issues - the adapter consistently falls out of outlets, given that it isn't proportioned correctly. The UK adapter works fine, but the US consistently falls out of the outlet since the adapter is bulky. The second issue is that there is a very bright blue light when there is power in the adapter. It will light up a dark room, and is completely unnecessary. Would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Yoder

customer_reviews.title: I like the blue light which makes it easy to find ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the blue light which makes it easy to find in the dark and to know if it's functioning. The adaptor is also very handy. However it's a bit heavy for an adapter.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Best charger ever BUT
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it was just my charger, but on the 5th day of my month long travels, the plug stopped working so I couldn't use my dual voltage flat iron (I know its not an adapter, but it had no problems the first 4 days of use). However I was able to use the 2 USB ports to charge my iPhones! I'd love to exchange for a brand new one if possible, as I love to travel out of the country yearly, and I love its versatility with US, EU, AUS & UK. Unfortunately I missed the "return" window but I hope the seller can make an exception with me since again, I was in Europe with my charger :((
customer_reviews.author: Juan Grajales

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I used the product in Vietnam and the power cycle is not 60 HZ. Damaged some equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Lenard

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to use on a trip to Italy. He said it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: It’s really convenient.
customer_reviews.text: My husband travels a lot every year for his business trip, and need to go to a lot of countries. This little device really can solve his problem, with this adapter, I need not check what kind adapter can be used in deferent countries and he need not change adapter any more,just put this in his luggage is ok. It’s really convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I travel about once a year internationally and was looking for a converter that can work in multiple countries instead of buying a converter for every place I went. This is what I was looking for! I went to Brazil and this totally saved me! Has a UK, USA,Australian, and continental Europe prongs and the outlet in the front with 2 USB ports on the bottom. Super easy to use and works great. I was even able to use my straightening iron with it! Definitely worth the money and saves you from wasting a lot of money buying converters for every place you want to go.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Used it in Australia and recently on a cruise where power strips were not allowed. The ship had options for both US and European plug-ins and this was great for USB charging. Highly recommended. I bought two colors one for me and one for my husband. Much more convenient than a power strip for sure!
customer_reviews.author: LizW

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine in Germany
customer_reviews.text: This is sufficient for a trip to Europe for charging phones, watches, etc. My only complaint is the button mechanism on the side is a little finicky and has to be double checked to see whether something actually charges. It has two USB ports which is nice. Decent value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Niccie

customer_reviews.title: By far my best best travel gadgets ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use like it advertised. Light weight and small size, yet it packed with the essential outlet functions while travel. Charge multiple devices without any issues. No longer need to bring additional outlets or adapters, this is your time saver during travel.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Handy for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Great little charger! This was so handy on our recent trip to Europe. We could charge both phones and my camera battery with one adapter no problem! Easy to use the tabs to change the prongs from country to country
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Universal Travel Adapter, All-in-one International Travel Charger with 2.4A Dual USB, Travel Power Adapter Travel Wall Charger for US, UK, EU, AU & Asia Covers 150+Countries (Green)
product_meta.description: Color:GreenUniversal Travel Adapter, All-in-one International Travel Charger with 2.4A Dual USB, Travel Power Adapter Travel Wall Charger for US, UK, EU, AU & Asia Covers 150+Countries (Green)
feature_bullets: International Adapter: The Travel Adapter covers over 150 countries with US/EU/UK/AUS plugs and Powerful Dual USB Ports. It can be worked in Canada, Mexico, Brazil, Central America, South America, Europe, Asia, the Middle East and so on.

Certified and Safety: This travel adapter has FCC, CE and RoHS certified safety system with safety 6.3 Amp fuse ensures complete protection for you and your devices, Built-in safey shutters protect users from the direct touch of the live parts on the socket outlet.

Smart Dual USB Ports: This universal charger is compatible with almost all USB Devices like Apple iPhone 7/6S/5S/4S, Samsung Galaxy S7/S6/S5/S4, Sony, Nokia, HTC, LG, HUAWEI, ZTE, Bluetooth Speaker, Digital Cameras and so on.

Charge 3 Devices: Power Up faster without taking multiple chargers on vacation! Compact and Powerful World Adapter Plug allows SIMULTANEOUS use of the AC Power Socket and Dual USB Ports. Charge 3 Devices at the same time without any mess at all, very Easy to use.

Promise: Best of all, by buying with us, you'll be working with a company that has a full LIFETIME PROMISE on every product that leaves our factory. Better still, we offer full customer support for all of your needs. Bottom line, it works, or our offer best service .
